content: caroline headband by ellikin knits what you ll need yarn weight super bulky size 6 yarn - 40 to 60 yards malabrigo rasta baah yarn mammoth lion brand wool ease thick & quick hedgehog fibres super bulky needles 9 mm us size 13 knitting needles circular or straight notions tapestry needle scissors measuring tape cable needle details skill level advanced beginner to intermediate measurements 8 5 wide x 4 tall - version 1 8 5 wide x 5 tall - version 2 abbreviations k knit p purl c6f slip the first 3 stitches onto your cable needle and hold at front of work knit next 3 stitches off of your left needle and then knit the 3 off of your cable needle c6b slip the first 3 stitches onto your cable needle and hold at back of work knit the next 3 stitches off of your left needle then knit the 3 off of your cable needle sts stitches caroline headband | ellikin knits ©2025| 2 notes this pattern is designed for super bulky size 6 yarn i ve used baah yarn mammoth malabrigo rasta lion brand wool-ease thick & quick and hedgehog fibres super bulky to adjust the size you can add an extra cable repeat this pattern includes two variations of the headband one slightly taller than the other so you can choose the style you prefer long tail cast on https //youtu be/fxdfrbkzssa how to bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=0pm2dqkpafi mattress stitch https //youtu be/obuzwhlmdci si=zuzhcorkv4nor52x policies this pattern and photos are property of ellikin knits and may not be altered shared or sold do not rewrite any part of this design and sell as your own design you re welcome to sell finished products made with this pattern but please credit the design to me stephanie hawkins of ellikin knits link to my website www ellikin com contact me via email ellikinknits@gmail com if you have any questions if you are on instagram please use #carolineheadband and tag me @ellikin_knits so i can see what you make caroline headband | ellikin knits ©2025 | 3 super bulky version 1 cast on using 9mm us size 13 knitting needles cast on 13 sts row 1 k2 p9 k2 row 2 k13 row 3 k2 p9 k2 row 4 k2 c6f k5 row 5 k2 p9 k2 row 6 k13 row 7 k2 p9 k2 row 8 k5 c6b k2 repeat row 1-8 until your piece measures 16-18 long for me that was 7 more times totaling 8 repeats ending on row 8 cast off cast off using your preferred method leaving a 12-inch tail for sewing i used the traditional bind-off then sew the ends together ensuring the seam remains on the inside of the headband caroline headband | ellikin knits ©2025 | 4 super bulky version 2 cast on using 9mm us size 13 knitting needles cast on 15 sts row 1 k3 p9 k3 row 2 k15 row 3 k3 p9 k3 row
